name: 楊哲化
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。1.超音波技術簡介2.基礎彈性力學3.彈性動力學4.平面波5.平面波的反射6.平面波的折射7.表面波8.藍姆波(平板波)9.超音波於非破壞檢測之應用10.超音波於材料性質量測之應用11.超音波於醫學診斷與治療之應用12.超音波於感測器及通訊應用之應用13.超音波於加工應用之應用
1.Introduction to ultrasonics 2.Basic elasticity for ultrasonics 3.Elastodynamics 4.Plane waves 5.Reflection of plane waves 6.Refraction of plane waves 7.Surface waves 8.Lamb waves 9.Ultrasonics in nondestructive testing  10.Application of ultrasonics to material characterizations 11.Application of ultrasonics in medical diagnostics and treatments 12.Application of ultrasonics to sensors and telecommunications 13.Application of ultrasonics to machining
